categories.cozy: Low-stakes, comforting adventures focused on community, relationships, and simple pleasures
categories.dark: Grimdark themes, moral ambiguity, horror elements, and challenging emotional content
categories.epic: High-stakes, world-saving adventures with powerful foes and legendary rewards
categories.mystery: Investigation-focused adventures with puzzles, clues, and hidden truths
categories.slice-of-life: Character-driven stories focusing on daily life and personal growth

items.title: The Vanishing Village
items.description: An entire village disappears overnight, leaving behind only footprints leading to the forest. The party must track what happened before the same fate befalls neighboring settlements.
items.setting: Rural farming community at forest edge
items.objective: Discover why the village vanished and rescue survivors
hooks: A family member lived in the village
The party owes the village a debt
A valuable artifact was lost there

items.title: The Cozy Cauldron Competition
items.description: A beloved tavern hosts its annual cooking competition, but this year someone is sabotaging contestants. Help your friend win while uncovering the culprit.
items.objective: Win the cooking competition and expose the saboteur
hooks: Your character's family recipe is at stake
The prize is a rare ingredient you need
The tavern owner is an old friend

items.title: Dragon's Last Breath
items.description: An ancient dragon calls upon heroes not to slay it, but to witness its final days and protect its legacy. Dark forces seek to corrupt its dying essence.
items.objective: Protect the dragon's final egg and legacy from corrupting forces
hooks: The dragon saved your ancestor
You carry a dragon-touched item
Prophecy names you as witness

items.title: Whispers in the Asylum
items.description: Patients at Greymoor Asylum are experiencing shared nightmares. Something ancient awakens in the basement, feeding on fear and madness.
items.objective: Stop the entity before it fully awakens
npcs: Nurse Blackwood (knows more than she says)
hooks: A loved one is committed here
You experienced the nightmares yourself
Hired by concerned family

items.title: Letters Never Sent
items.description: You discover a bundle of love letters never delivered. Tracing their origin leads to a decades-old story of forbidden love and a secret that could heal old wounds.
items.setting: Small coastal town with hidden history
items.objective: Deliver the letters and help resolve the past
npcs: The Intended Recipient (bitter from years of silence)
hooks: The letters mention your family
You found them in an inherited property
A ghost asked you to help

items.title: The Carnival of Forgotten Souls
items.description: A mysterious carnival appears on the outskirts of town. Those who enter forget their past lives and join as performers, trapped forever in endless revelry.
items.setting: Eerie carnival that exists between planes
items.objective: Free the trapped souls and destroy the carnival master
npcs: The Fortune Teller (reluctant servant with clues)
hooks: A friend joined and never returned
The carnival took your memories once
You inherited a carnival ticket

items.title: The Baker's Midnight Dough
items.description: A famous baker's secret ingredient is running out - moonlight flour from a hidden fairy grove. Accompany them on one last harvest before the grove closes forever.
items.setting: Enchanted forest glade under full moon
items.objective: Harvest enough moonlight flour and secure future access
hooks: You're the baker's apprentice
The bakery saved your life with magic bread
You made a promise to a fairy long ago

items.title: Siege of the Starfall Citadel
items.description: An army of celestial-hunting fiends lays siege to the last bastion of fallen stars. The angels within hold secrets that could end the Blood War.
items.setting: Massive fortress on the plane of stars
items.objective: Defend the citadel and protect the celestial secrets
hooks: You carry a fallen star's blessing
A celestial patron calls for aid
The secrets could save your world

items.title: The Inheritance Test
items.description: To claim your unexpected inheritance, you must solve three riddles left by an eccentric ancestor within their puzzle-filled mansion.
items.objective: Solve all riddles before rival claimants
hooks: You never knew this relative existed
The inheritance could save your village
Dark family secrets lurk within

items.title: The Merchant's Menagerie
items.description: A traveling merchant needs help transporting exotic (and sometimes magical) animals to a noble's private zoo. What could possibly go wrong?
items.objective: Safely deliver all creatures to their destination
hooks: One creature reminds you of a lost pet
You owe Safiya a favor
The noble promised a rare reward

items.title: The Grandmother's Garden
items.description: An elderly witch's enchanted garden is dying. Help her restore it by gathering memory blooms from places significant to her long life.
items.setting: Magical cottage garden, various flashback locations
items.objective: Gather memory blooms to restore the garden
hooks: She's your actual grandmother
She saved your life as a child
Her garden holds a cure you need

items.title: The Silent Orchestra
items.description: A legendary concert hall has gone silent - literally. No sound can be made within its walls. The spirits of famous musicians demand their final performance.
items.setting: Grand opera house, frozen in spectral silence
items.objective: Help the ghost orchestra perform their masterpiece
hooks: An ancestor was in the orchestra
You need music to break a curse
The silence is spreading to the city

items.title: Blood Moon Rising
items.description: A blood moon rises and won't set. Each night it stays, more villagers transform into lycanthropes. The curse traces back to a betrayal centuries old.
items.setting: Isolated mountain village under perpetual blood moon
items.objective: Break the ancient curse before everyone transforms
hooks: You were bitten and the clock is ticking
A family member is transforming
You're descended from the betrayer

items.title: The Last Library
items.description: You are chosen as the last Keeper of a library that exists outside time, containing every book ever written or imagined. Something is erasing entries.
items.objective: Find and stop what's erasing knowledge from existence
hooks: Your story is in danger of being erased
You wrote a book kept here
Prophecy marks you as the savior

items.title: The Tea Dragon Society
items.description: Tiny tea dragons are going missing from their caretakers. Help a young tea dragon keeper investigate while learning the peaceful art of dragon tea brewing.
items.objective: Find the missing tea dragons and protect the remaining ones
hooks: You bonded with a tea dragon
Tea dragons hold a family memory
You seek the calming tea for healing

items.title: The Titan's Tears
items.description: An imprisoned titan weeps, and each tear becomes a gem that grants immense power. Factions war over them while the titan's bonds weaken.
items.setting: Mountains where a titan is chained
items.objective: Decide the titan's fate and stop the faction war
npcs: The Guardian Order (keepers of the chains)
hooks: You possess a titan's tear gem
The titan speaks in your dreams
Your homeland is threatened by the war

items.title: Haunted Honeymoon
items.description: A couple hired you to cleanse their new home of ghosts before their wedding. The ghosts, however, are the home's previous owners - and they have opinions about the wedding.
items.objective: Negotiate peace between the living and dead
npcs: The Ghost Groom (died before his wedding)
hooks: You're the wedding planner
The ghosts are your ancestors
You promised to help as a favor

items.title: The Dream Eater's Bargain
items.description: You haven't been able to dream for years - a creature ate them. Now it offers to return them in exchange for stealing the dreams of others.
items.objective: Reclaim your dreams without becoming a monster
npcs: The Dreamless Ones (others who lost dreams)
hooks: Your creativity died with your dreams
Someone you love is the next target
Your dreams held prophecy

items.title: Festival of Masks
items.description: During the annual masquerade, guests are being replaced by doppelgangers. Unmask the infiltrators before the stroke of midnight when the switch becomes permanent.
items.objective: Identify and stop the doppelgangers
hooks: A party member may have been replaced
Someone you love is attending
You were hired as security

items.title: The Lighthouse Keeper's Last Watch
items.description: The elderly lighthouse keeper is retiring and needs someone to stay for one last storm, learning the lighthouse's secrets and the ghosts it guides home.
items.objective: Keep the light burning and help lost souls find peace
npcs: The Storm Hag (tries to extinguish the light)
hooks: A relative was lost at sea here
You seek solitude and purpose
The keeper knew your past

items.title: The Forge of First Fire
items.description: The legendary forge where the gods crafted the first weapons still burns. A group must relight it to craft the only weapon that can slay the approaching World Serpent.
items.setting: Volcanic forge at the heart of a mountain
items.objective: Relight the forge and craft the god-slaying weapon
npcs: The Serpent's Herald (trying to stop you)
hooks: You carry the last spark of First Fire
Your bloodline once served the forge
The weapon is your destiny

items.title: The Bookworm's Burden
items.description: A shy librarian accidentally awakened the characters from their favorite books. Help return the literary figures to their stories before the books crumble away.
items.objective: Return all book characters to their stories
hooks: One character is from your childhood book
The library was your sanctuary
A magical book called to you

items.title: The Plague Doctor's Legacy
items.description: A terrible plague spreads, and the only cure lies in the notes of a mad doctor who died a century ago. His laboratory still stands - and so do his failed experiments.
items.objective: Find the cure while surviving the horrors within
hooks: Someone you love is infected
You're a healer seeking any cure
The plague doctor was your ancestor

items.title: The Golem's Heart
items.description: A golem achieves sentience and seeks to understand what it is to be 'alive.' Help it explore its new existence while someone hunts it as an abomination.
items.objective: Protect the golem and help it find its place
npcs: The Purifier (zealot who wants to destroy it)
hooks: You created the golem
You're questioning your own existence
The golem saved your life

items.title: The Wandering Inn
items.description: A magical inn appears wherever travelers need it most, but it's getting lost. Help the innkeeper navigate between worlds while serving increasingly unusual guests.
items.setting: Cozy inn that shifts between planes
items.objective: Fix the inn's navigation while handling guests
npcs: Guests from Various Planes (each with needs)
hooks: The inn appeared when you needed it
You're seeking a specific plane
Your grandmother mentioned this inn

items.title: The Dragon's Dentist
items.description: You've gained reputation as someone who can help creatures others fear. Now a dragon with a terrible toothache seeks your aid - very carefully.
items.objective: Cure the dragon's toothache and earn a powerful ally
hooks: You're known for healing monsters
The dragon guards something you need
A friend recommended you specifically

items.title: The Memory Merchant
items.description: Someone is buying memories from the desperate - happy ones fetch the highest price. Track down the merchant before a friend sells the memory of your friendship.
items.objective: Stop the memory merchant and restore stolen memories
npcs: The Empty Ones (those who sold too much)
hooks: You already sold a memory you regret
A loved one's memory was taken
You're hunting your own lost memories

items.title: The Seed of the World Tree
items.description: The World Tree is dying, but produced one final seed. Multiple factions seek it - some to plant it properly, others to control its power, others to destroy it entirely.
items.setting: Dying forest, race across the land
items.objective: Protect the seed and find the proper place to plant it
npcs: The Dryad Queen (dying with the tree)
The Corrupted Druid (wants to control it)
hooks: You carry the seed
The tree spoke to you in dreams
Your forest home is dying

items.title: The Retirement Home for Adventurers
items.description: Retired adventurers are going missing from their care home. Investigate while helping the elderly heroes with their daily needs and listening to their incredible stories.
items.objective: Find the missing adventurers and uncover the scheme
npcs: Grizelda the Bold (retired fighter, still tough)
hooks: Your mentor lives here
You're planning your own retirement
A legendary hero went missing

items.title: The Color Thief
items.description: Color is being drained from the world - first from paintings, then flowers, then people's eyes. Track the thief before everything becomes gray.
items.objective: Stop the color thief and restore what was taken
npcs: The Gray Council (may be behind it)
hooks: Your favorite color was taken
You see colors others can't
An artist friend is fading away

items.title: The Monster Matchmaker
items.description: Run a matchmaking service for lonely monsters seeking companionship. Navigate cultural differences, deal with rival matchmakers, and find love for the unloved.
items.objective: Successfully match clients and grow the business
hooks: A monster helped you find love once
You're naturally empathetic to outcasts
Good money in an unusual trade

items.title: The Shadow Court
items.description: Your shadows gain independence and form their own court, demanding tribute and service. Other people's shadows are joining the rebellion.
items.objective: Negotiate with or defeat the Shadow Court
npcs: The Umbral Queen (power behind it all)
hooks: Your shadow was always strange
You dabbled in shadow magic
A loved one lost their shadow

items.title: The Starfall Shepherds
items.description: Falling stars are actually cosmic beings seeking new homes. You're chosen as a Shepherd, guiding them to safe landing while dark entities hunt them.
items.objective: Safely guide starfallen beings to sanctuary
hooks: You were born under a falling star
A star saved your village once
You've always felt drawn to the sky

items.title: The Grandmother's Recipes
items.description: Your grandmother's cookbook contains more than recipes - each dish unlocks memories of her adventures. Cook them all to discover the location of her greatest treasure.
items.objective: Cook all recipes and find grandmother's treasure
hooks: The cottage was left to you
Grandmother's stories shaped your childhood
The treasure can save your family

items.title: The War That Never Was
items.description: Everyone remembers the Great War differently - some say it lasted decades, others claim it was over in a day. Investigate timeline anomalies before reality fractures.
items.setting: City where different time versions overlap
items.objective: Stabilize the timeline and uncover the truth
hooks: You have memories that contradict
A loved one died/lived depending on the version
You're immune to timeline shifts

items.title: The Pet Cemetery Uprising
items.description: Beloved pets are rising from a cursed cemetery, but they're not the same. Something wears their forms, seeking to be loved again by any means necessary.
items.setting: Small town with ancient pet cemetery
items.objective: End the curse while honoring the departed
npcs: The First Pet (leader of the risen)
hooks: Your childhood pet is among them
You buried something there once
The curse touched your bloodline

items.title: The Infinite Tavern Crawl
items.description: A magical tavern crawl connects pubs across planes. Complete all challenges - drinking, darts, arm wrestling, and more - to win the legendary prize.
items.objective: Complete all challenges and win the crawl
hooks: The prize is something you desperately need
A friend went missing on a previous crawl
Family tradition demands you compete

items.title: The Dollmaker's Apprentice
items.description: A master dollmaker creates dolls so lifelike they seem to breathe. When people start disappearing and dolls start appearing in their likeness, investigate the dark craft.
items.objective: Save the transformed and stop the dollmaker
hooks: A friend was 'dollified'
You own one of the dolls
You once apprenticed there

items.title: The Phoenix's Nest
items.description: You're tasked with guarding a phoenix egg through its incubation - but the egg chooses its guardian, and you must prove worthy through trials of fire and rebirth.
items.objective: Successfully incubate the phoenix egg
hooks: You died and came back once
Fire has never burned you
A phoenix feather saved your life

items.title: The Midnight Garden Party
items.description: A cursed garden party repeats every night at midnight. The guests don't know they're dead, and solving the murder that ended the party is the only way to free them.
items.objective: Solve the murder and break the time loop
hooks: You're related to a guest
The garden holds something you need
You were invited by a ghost

items.title: The Familiar Exchange Program
items.description: Wizards are swapping familiars for a magical exchange program. Chaos ensues as mismatched pairs must learn to work together while solving a mystery about missing familiars.
items.objective: Bond with your temporary familiar and find the missing ones
npcs: Your Temporary Familiar (completely wrong for you)
hooks: Your usual familiar is among the missing
You're a new wizard seeking a familiar
Someone you care about runs the program

items.title: The Song That Ends the World
items.description: A bard accidentally learned part of a song that, when completed, will end existence. Now she's being hunted by those who want to complete it - and those who want to silence her forever.
items.setting: On the run across the realm
items.objective: Protect the bard and safely destroy the song
npcs: The Silent Order (will kill to prevent it)
hooks: You heard part of the song once
Lyria is your friend
You know where the final verse is hidden

items.title: The Therapy Dungeon
items.description: A wizard creates a magical dungeon designed to help adventurers work through trauma. Face rooms that manifest your fears, regrets, and unresolved emotions.
items.objective: Complete the dungeon and achieve emotional growth
hooks: A mentor recommended this
Traditional methods haven't helped
You're avoiding something you must face

items.title: The Witch's Inheritance
items.description: You've inherited a witch's cottage, complete with sentient house, opinionated plants, and a to-do list from beyond the grave. Complete her unfinished tasks to earn the home.
items.objective: Complete all inherited tasks
hooks: She was your secret relative
You dreamed of this place
You have nowhere else to go

items.title: The Labyrinth of Doors
items.description: Every door you open leads somewhere different - other rooms, other times, other realities. Find the one door that leads home while piecing together why you're here.
items.objective: Find the way home and understand the labyrinth
hooks: You opened a door that shouldn't exist
Someone you lost is here somewhere
The labyrinth itself called you

items.title: The Storm Singers
items.description: A cult uses the voices of stolen children to summon devastating storms. Infiltrate their ranks, rescue the children, and stop the eternal tempest they're building.
items.objective: Save the children and stop the eternal storm
hooks: A child you know was taken
You survived their storm
You were once one of them

items.title: The Map That Leads Everywhere
items.description: You acquire a map that always shows where you need to go - not where you want. Follow it through unexpected journeys of personal growth and discovery.
items.setting: Various locations the map leads to
items.objective: Trust the map and discover what you truly need
npcs: The Previous Owner (teaches you to read it)
hooks: You're lost in life, not just geographically
The map belonged to someone important
You're running from something

items.title: The Goat Conspiracy
items.description: The village's goats are acting strangely organized. Investigate their suspicious behavior - late night meetings, selective bleating, hiding objects - before the Grand Goat Plan unfolds.
items.objective: Uncover and deal with the goat conspiracy
hooks: Your goat is acting odd
Something of yours was stolen by goats
You can understand animals

items.title: The Necromancer's Support Group
items.description: Reformed necromancers meet weekly to stay on the path of good. When members start relapsing, investigate what's tempting them back while supporting their recovery.
items.objective: Help the necromancers and stop the relapses
hooks: You're a reformed necromancer
A loved one attends
A relapse threatens your community

items.title: The Kraken's Heart
items.description: A dying kraken offers its still-beating heart to whoever can retrieve a stolen treasure from the god that cursed it. Dive into divine waters and challenge the sea god's realm.
items.setting: Ocean depths and underwater god's palace
items.objective: Retrieve the treasure and claim the kraken's heart
hooks: The kraken's heart can save someone dying
The treasure was stolen from your ancestors
You made a promise long ago
